image_prompts.title: Ryūjin Girl 1
image_prompts.description: An anime-style portrait of a calm and mysterious ryūjin girl with grey cropped hair and blue eyes. She has small horns and faint scales, dragon features, scales on cheeks. She's wearing a plain shirt against a clean background. The art style is clean and modern anime with soft lighting and detailed character design.
image_prompts.negative_prompt: extra limbs, wings, tails, surreal features, blurry textures, ornate armor, fantasy background, glitch effects, malformed faces

image_prompts.title: Koumori Girl 9
